Pre-Game Insights: The defending champions England faced a disappointing loss against New Zealand in their opening match of the ODI World Cup 2023 and would be looking to bounce back against Bangladesh.
Bangladesh had a dream start to the competition, securing a six-wicket win over Afghanistan thanks to half-centuries from Mehidy Hasan Miraz and Nazmul Hossain Shanto.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association (HPCA) Stadium in Dharamshala, marking the second match at the venue in the ICC ODI World Cup.
The live streaming of the match will be available on Disney+ Hotstar for mobile users in India.
Others: The match is scheduled to start at 10:30 IST (+5:30 GMT).
According to Dafabet, England has a 1.21 odds while Bangladesh has a 4.70 odds for the match.
